trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of, and providing a root-level design mode view for, a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that supports nested controls and should receive scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: Designer a classe base para estender o comportamento no modo de design e fornecendo um modo de exibição do modo de design de nível raiz, um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que dá suporte a aninhado controles e deve receber mensagens de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: This designer is a root designer, meaning that it provides the root-level design mode view for the associated document when it is viewed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Esse designer é um designer raiz, que significa que ele fornece a exibição do modo de design de nível raiz para o documento associado quando ele for exibido no modo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode associar um designer com um tipo usando <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma visão geral de como personalizar o comportamento de tempo de design, consulte [Estendendo suporte em tempo de Design](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Checks for the existence of a menu editor service and creates one if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Verifica a existência de um serviço do editor de menu e cria um se ainda não existir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to ensure has a context menu service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> garantir que tem um serviço de menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection"></xref> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection"> </xref> que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphSelectionType"></xref> value that specifies the selection state.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphSelectionType"> </xref> valor que especifica o estado de seleção.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a ferramenta especificada é suportada pelo designer.

trans-unit.source: If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Se uma ferramenta for compatível, ele será ativado na caixa de ferramentas quando o designer recebe o foco.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ela será desabilitada.

trans-unit.source: Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it can not be queried again.
trans-unit.target: Depois que uma ferramenta é marcada como habilitado ou desabilitado ele não pode ser consultada novamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to test for toolbox support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> para testar o suporte da caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ferramenta deve ser ativada na caixa de ferramentas; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o designer do documento não sabe como usar a ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> para associar com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the menuEditorService variable to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a variável menuEditorService <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Called when the context menu should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o menu de contexto deve ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: This method displays the context menu of the document designer.
trans-unit.target: Esse método exibe o menu de contexto do designer de documento.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal screen coordinate to display the context menu at.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada horizontal da tela para exibir o menu de contexto em.

trans-unit.source: The vertical screen coordinate to display the context menu at.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada vertical da tela para exibir o menu de contexto em.

trans-unit.source: Called immediately after the handle for the designer has been created.
trans-unit.target: Chamado imediatamente depois que o identificador para o designer foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the set of properties the component exposes through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta o conjunto de propriedades que o componente expõe por meio de um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>que contém as propriedades para a classe do componente.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules"></xref> for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules"> </xref> para o designer.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules> that prevents the document from being resized.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules>que impede que o documento está sendo redimensionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.SelectionRules"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> that indicates a particular view technology.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref> que indica uma tecnologia de exibição específica.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o modo de exibição para este designer.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de suporte <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.GetToolSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to be tested for toolbox support.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> a ser testado para o suporte da caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool is supported by the toolbox and can be enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer does not know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ferramenta é compatível com a caixa de ferramentas e pode ser habilitada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o designer do documento não sabe como usar a ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to select.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: Selects the specified tool.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona a ferramenta especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A> is called when the user double-clicks on a toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A>é chamado quando o usuário clica duas vezes em um item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxUser.ToolPicked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document designer should create a component for the specified tool.
trans-unit.target: O designer do documento deve criar um componente para a ferramenta especificada.

trans-unit.source: Only tools that are enabled in the toolbox will be passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: Somente as ferramentas que estão habilitadas na caixa de ferramentas serão passadas para este método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to create a component for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> para criar um componente para.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
